description: This file defines a composable screen named FavoritesScreen used in an Android app built with Jetpack Compose. It displays a list of favorite recipes, showing a message if there are none. It imports UI components and data models, including a placeholder recipe list and a custom RecipeCard widget.

methods.name: FavoritesScreen
methods.description: A composable function that displays a list of favorite recipes, showing a message when the list is empty.
